answers.answer: Don't get to down about it.. I know it really *****.. just watch ur carbs. The diet thwy usually give is 45 carbs at each meal and 15 carb snacks. They give u an allowance of 180 carbs a day. Also don't stress, the stress raises ur blood sugar as well. And anger does too. Just keep calm and try to move after each meal to keep ur sugar down. On the "bright" side, u may maintain ur weight or even loose weight.
Thank you! Its hard but I know I will get through it. I haven't gained any weight at all & I'm 28w3d.

Oh yea my baby was 6lbs 15oz. And they put me on glyburide. I didn't need insulin tho. And they gave me the option of getting an nst test each week or getting a biophysical profile each week. I chose the biophysical. I got to see my baby every week :) I even got to see her in a 4d sonogram :)
